In my role as Chief Visionary, I oversee the jewelry design and production, coordinate marketing and PR,  and manage new account development and strategic partnerships. My focus is on Cause Marketing and the benefits of aligning corporations with causes through the power of charms.

Sold company in 2015. THRIVE@55 is a movement to share ideas, information, and inspiration with women in their Encore years. We are a membership based community that holds gatherings, conferences, and retreats to help and support women in transition, with the objective to optimize life. www,thriveat55.com.

Sold company in 2008.Regalia Accessory Collection was a Fashion Accessories Wholesale and Retail company that I co-owned for 18 years. We sourced and designed products globally (Bali, India, and the Orient) and worked closely with jewelry manufacturers in Providence, R.I. Sales channels included a retail store, wholesale reps, online sales, and event sales through home parties, Costco roadshows,and Junior League Gift Marts nationwide.
Directed design team to produce womens dresses and sportswear to sell to department stores and chains. Garments were manufactured in India. Travelled to France and Italy for design inspiration.

summary: WHO I AMI am the CEO and founder of Charity Charms, a  B2B company that creates custom charm programs for non profit organizations, charities, schools, and cause minded corporations. As an idea person and change maker, I enjoy creating marketing campaigns that pull together important causes with collaborative parties that emphasize philanthropy, bring awareness, and build community. WHAT I DOSince 2004, Charity Charms has helped over 500 organizations worldwide raise over $10,000,000 in awareness and funds. We do this by creating an impactful and wearable charm bracelet created from the organization's logo. We work with each client to determine the many ways they can use the custom Charity Charm bracelets throughout their organization (Fundraising, Gala Gifts, Donation Drives, Volunteer thank you gifts, Recognition Gifts, Swag Bags, Walks and Runs (A-thons), Online and Retail Gift Shops,  & Charity Events. When applicable, we help them engage a sponsor to underwrite their campaign through our "CHARMED GIVING" cause marketing program. WHO I HELPNon ProfitsOrganizations and FoundationsPrivate and Public SchoolsHealth and Wellness CentersCause Minded Corporations Engaging in collaborations with like minded social entrepreneurs and companies in our industry is an important focus, as well as offering added value to our clients through referrals and recommendations. (Products, Software, Cause Marketing Campaigns)LET ME HELP YOU: visit www.charitycharms.com1) Order a sample kit of our custom charms       https://jg115.infusionsoft.com/app/orderForms/GivingBands-Experience-Kit2)  Request a Quote: http://charitycharms.com/requestaquote/3) Sign up for a 15 minute strategy session E-Mail me:   kay@charitycharms.com See how your donation of $5000 can grow to $10,000+ (click below for CHARMED GIVING)http://charitycharms.com/big-cause-marketing/Branding, cause marketing, jewelry merchandising/design/production, non profit and fundraising expert.
